definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
Get well soon!/to recover health quickly

sentences.english: Her mother sparked to the idea of an early wedding date.
sentences.chinese: 她母親悵然贊同早日舉行婚禮的計劃。

sentences.english: Hope to hear from you soon.
He was single -mindedly devoted to the hastening of freedom for the oppressed.
sentences.chinese: 他一心一意致力於早日讓被壓迫者獲得自由。

sentences.english: Your cooperate is returning the enclosed form promptly would be much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 我公司將非常感謝貴方早日寄回信內所附的表格。

sentences.english: Outline based on the early loco type, with typical Shay features.
sentences.chinese: 大綱的基礎上早日買賣類型，謝伊的典型特徵。

sentences.english: See you soon, lots of luv , Sue.
sentences.chinese: 盼早日見到你，非常愛你的，休。

sentences.english: I will end here and hope to hear from you very soon.
sentences.chinese: 我要就此擱筆了，盼望早日收到你的來信。

sentences.english: China extends its congratulations and wishes them early recovery of health.
sentences.chinese: 中方對此表示祝賀，並祝願獲救礦工早日恢復健康。

sentences.english: As prices is steady raising, we’d advise you to place your order without delay.
sentences.chinese: 因爲價格正在穩步上升，我方建議你方早日下訂單。

sentences.english: It also features an early apperance of Jackie Chan.
sentences.chinese: 它還具有一個成龍早日出現。

sentences.english: However, I wish he could recover for the World Cup, "he added."
sentences.chinese: 不過，我祝願他能早日康復並參加世界盃。

sentences.english: Your early attention to this would be appreciate.
sentences.chinese: 如貴公司早日辦理則不勝感激。

sentences.english: B:I hope your grandfather will recover soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你爺爺早日康復。

sentences.english: Hoping you're feeling better every day and will soon be well tostay.
sentences.chinese: 願你一天比一天更好，早日痊癒，健康常保。

sentences.english: I should be grateful if you would send it to me at an early date.

definition: Get well soon!/to recover health quickly
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to escape from the abyss of suffering/to shed off a wretched plight
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to congratulate beforehand/to offer best wishes for
